tweet.text: Between October 12 and 22, 2001, the @StateDept’s main mail processing center in Sterling, VA, was closed after an anthrax-contaminated letter was routed there after the September 11 terrorist attacks. https://t.co/FpLbQtmjJx #twitterstorians
tweet.html: Between October 12 and 22, 2001, the @StateDept’s main mail processing center in Sterling, VA, was closed after an anthrax-contaminated letter was routed there after the September 11 terrorist attacks. go.usa.gov/xQN6F #twitterstorians
